layman_description: How much hurt you take when falling on this block.
technical_description: Defines a modifier multiplier for damage received from falling onto this block surface.
player_impact: Blocks with low values like 0.5 cushion your fall, while high values like 0.9 make landing harder.

layman_description: How long something can stay in the air before falling.
technical_description: Determines the duration in seconds an object maintains airborne state before gravity takes effect.
player_impact: Longer flight times let you cover more distance when using flying items or vehicles.

layman_description: Extra amount added to how good the loot is when you harvest this.
technical_description: Adds a numerical bonus to the loot stage calculation during resource extraction.
player_impact: Higher values give you better quality items and more resources when harvesting this block.

layman_description: Percentage that multiplies the quality of loot you find here.
technical_description: Applies a multiplicative modifier to the loot stage value for resource generation.
player_impact: Small values like 0.05 slightly reduce loot quality, while values above 1 boost it significantly.

layman_description: Whether you can break this item down for resources.
technical_description: Boolean flag preventing the item from being scrapped into component materials.
player_impact: Items marked true cannot be recycled, forcing you to use them or store them.

layman_description: How much durability this item restores when used to fix something.
technical_description: Specifies the durability points healed by this item when applied during repair actions.
player_impact: Higher values like 800 fully repair many items, while 20 requires multiple uses.

layman_description: Whether this thing automatically aligns with the ground when placed.
technical_description: Enables automatic rotation adjustment to match terrain slope upon placement.
player_impact: Objects with this enabled look natural when placed on hills and slopes.

layman_description: How many cobblestones you get when you harvest this block.
technical_description: Defines the exact or average quantity of cobblestone resources yielded on destruction.
player_impact: More cobblestones means faster construction of stone walls and building material gathering.

layman_description: The visual effect that happens when you aim with a PlayStation controller.
technical_description: Sets the visual zoom effect identifier for DualSense controller aiming mechanics.
player_impact: Creates immersive aiming feedback that changes your view when using controller zoom.

layman_description: The visual effect that happens when you aim with an Xbox controller.
technical_description: Specifies the zoom effect identifier applied during Xbox controller trigger pulls.
player_impact: Provides consistent aiming visuals whether using adaptive triggers or standard controllers.

layman_description: The fifth action a zombie or creature should do in sequence.
technical_description: Sets the fifth priority behavior task executed by AI entities in their action queue.
player_impact: Creatures execute multiple behaviors in order like wandering, attacking, or looking for threats.

layman_description: Bonuses that apply to players standing near this block.
technical_description: Lists area-of-effect buffs and their radius values activated when players are in proximity.
player_impact: Standing by campfires gives warmth buffs, near radiation emitters causes damage.

layman_description: A special effect applied to a player or creature.
technical_description: Specifies a persistent status effect identifier to be applied to affected entities.
player_impact: Buffs can poison you, burn you, stun you, or protect you depending on the effect type.

layman_description: How strong this block shows up on zombie heat vision.
technical_description: Controls the intensity value in the thermal signature detection system for AI entities.
player_impact: Blocks with high heat like fires attract zombies from farther away.

layman_description: How long this block stays visible on zombie heat detection.
technical_description: Sets the duration in milliseconds that thermal signatures persist for creature detection.
player_impact: Longer durations make your heat sources detectable by creatures for extended periods.

layman_description: What loot drops from creatures when you kill them.
technical_description: References the loot table list used for item drops from defeated living entities.
player_impact: Different creatures drop different loot pools with unique and valuable items.

layman_description: How long you can hold down the attack button before needing a break.
technical_description: Defines the maximum duration in seconds before tool strain fatigue triggers cooldown.
player_impact: Longer strain times let you continuously attack, while short values force frequent rest periods.

layman_description: How far away creatures can spot players.
technical_description: Sets the distance in meters at which creatures detect and engage hostile targets.
player_impact: Creatures with 30m sight range spot you from far away, while 20m range requires closer approach.

layman_description: The sound this creature makes when it stops chasing you.
technical_description: Specifies the audio clip identifier played when the entity abandons pursuit behavior.
player_impact: Hearing a creature give up lets you know the danger has passed.

layman_description: How many metal pipes you get when you break this block.
technical_description: Defines the quantity of metal pipe resources yielded during block destruction.
player_impact: More pipes mean faster crafting of weapons, traps, and mechanical structures.

layman_description: Where the wheels are located on a vehicle.
technical_description: References the 3D shape node positions for vehicle wheel attachment points.
player_impact: Wheel placement affects vehicle balance, handling, and visual appearance.

layman_description: The sixth action a zombie or creature performs in its behavior sequence.
technical_description: Sets the sixth ordered behavior task in the AI entity action execution queue.
player_impact: Creatures can combine multiple actions like wandering then attacking based on task order.

layman_description: The seventh behavior action for creatures during combat or exploration.
technical_description: Specifies the seventh sequential behavior task in creature AI execution flow.
player_impact: Complex AI sequences with seven tasks create more realistic creature behavior patterns.

layman_description: How much pain this block causes when you touch or stand on it.
technical_description: Sets the direct damage value applied to entities in contact with this hazard block.
player_impact: High damage values like 20 quickly kill you, while 1 is barely noticeable.

layman_description: How much bigger or smaller loot appears when you drop it.
technical_description: Applies a scale multiplier to the 3D shape of dropped items during collection.
player_impact: Larger scales make dropped loot easier to spot on the ground.

layman_description: Whether this item is only for appearance and not actually used.
technical_description: Boolean flag indicating an item provides no functional gameplay value, only visual setting.
player_impact: Cosmetic items don't affect your stats or abilities, only how you look.

layman_description: Whether this block disappears after a short time.
technical_description: Boolean flag marking blocks that automatically despawn after placement duration expires.
player_impact: Temporary blocks are useful for quick shelter but won't protect you long-term.

layman_description: How quickly creatures can rotate to face you.
technical_description: Sets the maximum rotational velocity in degrees per second for entity heading changes.
player_impact: Creatures with high turn speeds like 420 quickly face threats, while 100 turn slowly.

layman_description: What type of ground surface this block matches or creates.
technical_description: References the terrain category value used in heightmap generation and surface matching.
player_impact: Terrain index affects walking speed and whether objects slide on the surface.

layman_description: Which trader runs a store at this location.
technical_description: Specifies the unique identifier for the trader entity present at this block location.
player_impact: Different traders offer different items and prices for buying and selling.

layman_description: The picture shown behind menus when this block is active.
technical_description: References the display image identifier used in the menu background rendering system.
player_impact: Different blocks show different menu backgrounds for visual clarity and theme consistency.

layman_description: The aiming effect on PlayStation when pulling the trigger.
technical_description: Defines the zoom effect identifier executed during DualSense trigger activation.
player_impact: Aiming creates visual zoom effects that enhance accuracy perception.

layman_description: The aiming effect on Xbox when pulling the trigger.
technical_description: Sets the zoom visual effect identifier for Xbox controller trigger pull events.
player_impact: Consistent trigger zoom effects help you aim accurately on any platform.

layman_description: All the actions creatures can do in sequence to hunt and attack.
technical_description: Lists the complete set of behavior tasks executed by creature AI in priority order.
player_impact: Complex task lists make creatures unpredictable and challenging to fight.

layman_description: The sound that plays when you use this block.
technical_description: Specifies the audio clip identifier played when the block is activated or triggered.
player_impact: Feedback sounds let you know when you've successfully used a block or door.

layman_description: How close the item appears before it becomes hidden from view.
technical_description: Sets the distance threshold in first-person view where held items become invisible.
player_impact: Prevents items from blocking your vision when held very close to your eyes.

layman_description: What kind of harm this item or block deals.
technical_description: Specifies the damage classification determining resistances and effect interactions.
player_impact: Heat damage ignites fires, barbed wire bleeds you, special damage bypasses some defenses.

layman_description: How long you must hold down the button to harvest something.
technical_description: Sets the duration in seconds required for the harvest action to complete successfully.
player_impact: Shorter times let you gather resources faster, longer times require patience.

layman_description: Whether thrown items stick to walls and surfaces.
technical_description: Boolean flag determining if projectiles adhere to surfaces on impact.
player_impact: Sticky items like grenades don't bounce away, making placement more predictable.

layman_description: Probability that your lock pick breaks when trying to open something.
technical_description: Sets the percentage chance that a lock pick tool breaks during the unlock action.
player_impact: 75% break chance means you often lose lock picks, requiring many to stockpile.

layman_description: What item you need to open a locked container or door.
technical_description: Specifies the inventory item identifier required as the key for unlock actions.
player_impact: Finding lock picks becomes necessary for accessing locked safes and doors.

layman_description: How many seconds you must spend picking a lock.
technical_description: Defines the duration in seconds for the lock picking action to succeed.
player_impact: Longer times like 20 seconds expose you to danger while locked in the action.

layman_description: The angle a creature can see up and down when searching.
technical_description: Sets the vertical field of view angle in degrees for creature visual perception.
player_impact: Higher angles let creatures spot threats above and below more easily.

layman_description: Which direction this block faces or points toward.
technical_description: Defines the orientation vector indicating the forward facing direction of the block.
player_impact: Blocks with direction matter for traps, vents, and other directional mechanics.

layman_description: The identifier for a specific NPC character or trader.
technical_description: Specifies the unique identification string for a named non-player character entity.
player_impact: Different NPCs offer unique quests, trades, and dialogue interactions.

layman_description: Categories this item belongs to for swapping it with others.
technical_description: Sets the inventory slot category tag allowing cross-item substitution and swapping.
player_impact: Items in the same replacement category can swap places in your inventory.

layman_description: The colored coating or visible parts on a vehicle.
technical_description: References the vehicle body part or surface decoration element identifier.
player_impact: Paint colors let you customize vehicle appearance for personal style.

layman_description: What action activates or controls this vehicle part.
technical_description: Specifies the input or condition that activates this vehicle system or behavior.
player_impact: Different triggers control acceleration, steering, and special vehicle functions.

layman_description: The way this vehicle part moves or rotates.
technical_description: Defines the movement classification for physics calculations like spinning or relative motion.
player_impact: Spin type creates rotating wheels, relative type moves with vehicle direction.

layman_description: How far away creatures search for sounds you make.
technical_description: Sets the detection radius in meters for creature audio-based threat sensing.
player_impact: Creatures with larger ranges hear your attacks from farther away.

layman_description: The eighth behavior action in a creature's action sequence.
technical_description: Defines the eighth ordered behavior task for creature AI execution.
player_impact: Eight-task sequences create complex and challenging creature behaviors.

layman_description: What kind of motion or movement this item uses.
technical_description: Specifies the animation classification determining how the item visually moves.
player_impact: Different animation types make items feel responsive and realistic during use.

layman_description: Effects that happen to you when you stand on this block.
technical_description: Lists the status effects applied to entities in contact with this hazard surface.
player_impact: Walking on burning ground applies fire damage, radiation blocks cause sickness.

layman_description: How fast bullets come out in rapid fire mode.
technical_description: Sets the fire rate in seconds between shots during burst fire attacks.
player_impact: Lower values like 0.15 create rapid firing, higher values like 1 single shots.

layman_description: How often this block updates its heat signal for creatures.
technical_description: Sets the update interval in milliseconds for thermal signature recalculation.
player_impact: Frequent updates make your heat sources constantly trackable by zombies.

layman_description: Whether this creature won't react when you shoot near it.
technical_description: Boolean flag preventing creature behavior triggering from nearby hostile actions.
player_impact: Creatures with this setting stay calm even when attacked, making them harder to engage.

layman_description: How much easier lock picks work on this lock.
technical_description: Applies a modifier to lock pick effectiveness during unlock attempts.
player_impact: Lower values make locks easier to pick, higher values require more attempts.

layman_description: How long you must work to fix something with this item.
technical_description: Specifies the duration in seconds needed to complete a repair action.
player_impact: Faster repair times let you quickly fix tools, slower times require patience.

layman_description: Whether this block can only be used once before disappearing.
technical_description: Boolean flag marking blocks that become unavailable after a single activation.
player_impact: Single-use blocks disappear after you use them once, forcing reuse elsewhere.

layman_description: The alert sound a creature makes before attacking.
technical_description: References the audio clip identifier played as a pre-attack warning signal.
player_impact: Hearing warning sounds gives you a split second to prepare for creature attacks.

layman_description: How far from the surface sticky items appear when attached.
technical_description: Sets the distance offset value for sticky projectiles after surface adhesion.
player_impact: Larger offsets make sticky grenades sit further out from walls.

layman_description: How far the item goes when you throw it with normal force.
technical_description: Specifies the default velocity multiplier for thrown projectile launch.
player_impact: Higher values like 20 throw far away, lower values like 6 are short tosses.

layman_description: Whether this item distracts creatures when thrown.
technical_description: Boolean flag indicating the item acts as a decoy object for creature distraction.
player_impact: Throwable decoys draw creature attention away from you.

layman_description: How fast this item travels through the air.
technical_description: Sets the initial speed value in units per second for projectile motion.
player_impact: Higher velocities like 50 make projectiles reach far quickly, 4.5 is slow and weak.

layman_description: Whether finishing this quest counts toward your overall progress.
technical_description: Boolean flag determining if quest completion increments tier progression tracking.
player_impact: Quests with this enabled contribute to unlocking harder difficulty tiers.

layman_description: How many clay pieces you get from harvesting this block.
technical_description: Defines the quantity of clay resources yielded during block destruction.
player_impact: More clay lets you craft pottery and ceramic items for building.

layman_description: A unique name for this specific quest in your game.
technical_description: Sets the unique identifier string for referencing this quest throughout the game.
player_impact: Unique keys prevent duplicate quests and track which ones you've completed.

layman_description: How much creatures boost or reduce their vision abilities.
technical_description: Applies a multiplicative modifier to creature sight distance calculations.
player_impact: Higher offsets let creatures see you from farther away.

layman_description: Whether you can place blocks over other blocks here.
technical_description: Boolean flag allowing block replacement within this designated area.
player_impact: Replaceable blocks let you upgrade and modify structures quickly.

layman_description: How many of something to spawn or create.
technical_description: Specifies the quantity value for entity spawning or resource generation.
player_impact: Higher counts mean more items drop or more creatures appear.

layman_description: How much damage this tool takes with each swing.
technical_description: Sets the durability penalty applied per action during tool usage.
player_impact: Tools with high degradation like 250 break quickly, 99999 never wear out.

layman_description: Whether this is a player, creature, or other kind of thing.
technical_description: Specifies the classification determining behavior scripting and interaction mechanics.
player_impact: Different entity types behave differently in combat and interactions.

layman_description: How much extra damage explosions do to metal blocks.
technical_description: Applies a multiplier to explosion damage calculations for metallic surfaces.
player_impact: High bonuses like 1 destroy metal defenses, low values like 0.05 barely scratch them.

layman_description: How much extra damage explosions do to stone blocks.
technical_description: Sets the multiplier for explosion impact on stone surface calculations.
player_impact: Explosions with high stone bonuses quickly destroy stone walls.

layman_description: How much extra damage explosions do to wooden structures.
technical_description: Applies a damage multiplier to explosion effects against wood surfaces.
player_impact: Explosions with high wood bonuses are devastating to wooden defenses.

layman_description: How many seconds before an explosive item detonates.
technical_description: Defines the timer duration in seconds before explosion activation occurs.
player_impact: Short fuse times like 3 give little warning, long ones like 20 allow escape.

layman_description: Whether you waste damage when hitting something already broken.
technical_description: Boolean flag preventing overkill damage from reducing overall harvest efficiency.
player_impact: Disabled overkill damage lets you maximize resource gathering effectiveness.

layman_description: Where the left hand appears on a vehicle's driver seat.
technical_description: Defines the 3D coordinate position for inverse kinematics left hand placement.
player_impact: Hand positions affect how realistic the driver looks while controlling vehicles.

layman_description: Which way the left hand rotates while holding a vehicle's controls.
technical_description: Sets the rotational angle values for inverse kinematics left hand orientation.
player_impact: Realistic hand rotations make driving animations look natural and immersive.

layman_description: Where the right hand appears on a vehicle's driver seat.
technical_description: Defines the 3D coordinate position for inverse kinematics right hand placement.
player_impact: Right hand position determines how the player grips vehicle controls visually.

layman_description: Which way the right hand rotates while holding a vehicle's controls.
technical_description: Sets the rotational angle values for inverse kinematics right hand orientation.
player_impact: Rotated hands make vehicle control grip look realistic and natural.

layman_description: What negative effects this creature completely ignores.
technical_description: Lists the status effect identifiers that cannot be applied to this entity.
player_impact: Immune creatures can't be poisoned, diseased, or sickened by these effects.

layman_description: Whether this weapon swings left-to-right instead of up-and-down.
technical_description: Boolean flag determining swing arc orientation for melee weapon attack animations.
player_impact: Horizontal swings hit wider areas, vertical swings hit overhead targets better.

layman_description: The different functions this workstation can perform.
technical_description: Lists the functional module categories this crafting station supports.
player_impact: Workstations with more modules can craft more diverse items.

layman_description: The chance that a sticky item actually sticks when thrown.
technical_description: Sets the probability value for successful surface adhesion on impact.
player_impact: Low percentages like 0.2 often result in bouncing, high values guarantee sticking.

layman_description: The farthest distance you can throw something with maximum power.
technical_description: Specifies the maximum velocity multiplier achievable for thrown projectiles.
player_impact: Higher maximums like 60 let you throw much farther than default strength.

layman_description: The highest alert level before a creature fully aggresses.
technical_description: Sets the maximum warning status value before full combat engagement.
player_impact: Creatures with high warning thresholds attack sooner when alerted.

layman_description: The picture shown in menus for this crafting station.
technical_description: References the icon display image identifier for workstation menu representation.
player_impact: Icons help you identify different crafting stations at a glance.

layman_description: How much stopping power the vehicle brakes have.
technical_description: Sets the braking force value in torque units for deceleration calculations.
player_impact: Higher values like 5000 stop quickly, low values like 10 barely slow down.

layman_description: How far back the camera sits when driving a vehicle.
technical_description: Defines the distance in units from the vehicle where the camera is positioned.
player_impact: Longer distances give better view of surroundings while driving.

layman_description: How quickly the camera rotates when you turn the vehicle.
technical_description: Sets the angular velocity in degrees per second for camera rotation.
player_impact: Higher rates like 0.35 make the camera snap to view quickly.

layman_description: The strength of movement or rotation applied to this vehicle part.
technical_description: Specifies the force magnitude value for physics calculations on vehicle systems.
player_impact: Higher force values make vehicle parts respond more energetically to inputs.

layman_description: The category name for grouping related quests together.
technical_description: Sets the key identifier for quest grouping and organization in quest menus.
player_impact: Quest groups help organize related objectives and track quest lines.

layman_description: The sound a vehicle makes when you press the horn button.
technical_description: References the audio clip identifier for horn alert activation.
player_impact: Different vehicles have distinct horn sounds for personality and style.

layman_description: The extra acceleration power when using turbo or boost mode.
technical_description: Sets the enhanced torque values in turbo mode for high-performance driving.
player_impact: Higher turbo torque like 4500 gives dramatic acceleration boosts.

layman_description: Helpful tips displayed when you're stuck on a quest.
technical_description: Specifies the hint message identifiers shown when requesting objective guidance.
player_impact: Hints help new players understand vague quest goals without spoiling solutions.

layman_description: What category this quest belongs to for organization.
technical_description: Specifies the quest classification determining reward scaling and difficulty.
player_impact: Special quest types offer unique rewards and gameplay variations.

layman_description: How quickly a vehicle steering returns to center when released.
technical_description: Sets the angular velocity in degrees per second for steering auto-centering.
player_impact: Higher rates like 90 snap steering straight quickly after turning.

layman_description: How fast you can rotate the vehicle's steering wheel.
technical_description: Defines the rotational sensitivity in degrees per second for steering input.
player_impact: Higher rates like 130 make sharp turns easier but require precision.

layman_description: The steepest angle a vehicle can tilt before tipping over.
technical_description: Sets the maximum lean angle in degrees before vehicle rollover occurs.
player_impact: Higher angles like 80 prevent rolling on slopes, low angles like 2 cause easy flips.

layman_description: How much tilt to allow before the vehicle stabilizes itself.
technical_description: Specifies the angle threshold value for applying tilt damping physics.
player_impact: Higher thresholds let vehicles lean farther before stabilization kicks in.
